column4: ive got 2 girls that i want to get them start using computers but don't want to buy new computers for them. can they use some sort of terminal service to connect to my computer?
i was looking at PXE but am unsure what I should be looking at

What you are talking about is the old model of a network with a mainframe.  Just a mouse, monitor and keyboard are at the desk.  There are several workstations like this and they all connect to the mainframe (your serer)
